name: Mini Spice Eye Palette
about: What it is:An essential mini eyeshadow collection featuring nine full-pigment shadesu2014from warm-toned neutrals to brilliant goldsu2014in matte and metallic finishes...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This palette contains nine eyeshadow shades from soft neutrals to bright sparkly tones, in five mattes and four metallic finishes. The full-pigment formula delivers high color payoff and buildable intensity..This Palette Contains:

Silica, Boron Nitride, Synthetic Wax, Nylon-12, Zinc Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Lauroyl Lysine, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Isopentyldiol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Carmine (Ci 75470), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use a light hand when picking up productu2014because the formula is full pigment, a little bit goes a long way. .-To apply eyeshadow, use a flat brush to deposit color, highlight, or pack eyeshadow onto the lid. .-Use a fluffy-ended brush to diffuse and blend out shadow. .-For a more intense color payoff, pair metallic shades with a setting spray. .-Use the matte and metallic eyeshadows as highlight shades. .-Use the warm matte-neutral eyeshadows for contouring and defining, and the warm- and cool-metallic eyeshadows as accent shades. . ..PRO TIPS:.-For a more intense color payoff, pair the metallic shades with a setting spray. .-Create a gradient smoky eye look using a cool-tone shade for contouring and a warm-tone shade for blending out. .-The contrast between the warm and cool tones come together to create a high-impact eye look. .-Use any of the bright shades as a cheek color. .-Use the deeper matte shades to define the lash line. .-The highlight shades can be used on the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very versatile and i use it everyday! not really an u201ceyeshadow girlu201d but this one is a must-have

reviews.review_text: Beautiful product, however one of the shades just fell out and shattered with gentle use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is great for everyday where. I know it has some shimmers but itu2019s perfect for my daily use when I want my eyes to pop. It doesnu2019t have to be too dramatic unless you want it to be!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning eyeshadow! Itu2019s perfect for everyday makeup and holidays

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like this palette,  more than I thought I would.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Palette came damaged. I was terribly disappointed. I bought it as a gift. Support could not help, because the delivery was not made to a residential address.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The full-size palettes are way better. For me, there's only 2 shades in this one that I'd consider using, after seeing it in person. The glittery shades have chunky glitter flakes that get everywhere - even onto the few included matte shades.   The matte shades were pretty and pigmented but it wasn't worth keeping just for the 2 shades I ended up liking. I ended up returning this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador and this is my authentic review and opinion of this product. I love a holiday release and thought this was an excellent deal for the price. It's got some pretty matte shades and lovely shimmers. I think it makes my blue eyes pop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great quality eyeshadows. The shimmers are soooo pretty. Also love that it had a mirror. Nice range of warm colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Iu2019m a big fan of the line in general but this is my first eyeshadow palette from them. Does not disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like everything from Anastasia, this is a great pallet. Do I have all these colors and other pallets? Yes I do! However, having them all in one is ideal. This is perfect for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Palette came damaged. Very disappointing. Better packaging wouldu2019ve been nice. Colours were pretty though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are lighter in the picture and itu2019s hard to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is a high quality one! Pigmented, nice colour and beautiful glitters. The glitter wonu2019t fall out if you apply without blending them, and I donu2019t even use glue glitter! For me the most beautiful and high quality palette of the year

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a pretty palette. The colors a beautiful and natural. Easy to apply. 100% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The matter in this palette perform great, even though they have a lot of kick up.  Those glitters are a nightmare.  I even used glitter glue and my finger and still ended up with tons of fallout. Overall I love the palette but skip those glitters

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this but I losed my money, I never received it, They made a mistake in an order of 3 products, they sent me a travel set, and they never wanted to return my money nor did they want to send the paid products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this palette itu2019s been one of my go to makeup palettes easy to blend love the shimmers also

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful palette. I can create multiple looks with it. The pigment is perfect-I prefer a buildable pigment and this does just that. It is a dusty formula, but that is not a deal breaker for me. I highly recommend this product! Itu2019s perfect for traveling as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The matte shades like A1 and C3 are great but steer clear of the heavily glittered ones like B1, B2 and B3: extremely heavy fallout and glitter got into my eyes causing the worst stinging Iu2019ve ever had. I had to remove all makeup and flush my eyes with water for 5 minutes. Eyes are puffy and sore now, like Iu2019ve had an allergic reaction. Buyer beware.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors, but the mattes have an INSANE amount of kick-up.  They do blend nicely, and the shimmers are very dramatic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Abh never fails when it comes to eye shadow palettesu2026 feels like like 2014 all over again Iu2019m back obsessing. The shimmers are stunning and last all day!! This and my makeup by Mario palette are my rude pride

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is so gorgeous. I love that it has range, from matte to shimmery matte to shiny sheer diamond-effect shades. A must have item in my collection, I'm truly amazed by the quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is beautiful.  The colors are so soft and make for a lovely neutral palette.   But the panu2019s have more fallout than I expected, especially from ABH.   The shimmer shades do better when sprayed with setting spray first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful palette that is warm toned. So if youu2019re looking for a cool or neutral this isnu2019t it. The shimmers are gorgeous perfect for holiday season and the lighter browns are great for daytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is absolutely beautiful & exceeded my expectations. The mattes blend like butter & the shimmers are stunning, theyu2019re more of a glitter topper.. but pack such a punch! Love how compact this palette is too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the colors in the palette but there is wayyy too much glitter fallout below my eyes when I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time purchasing an ABH eyeshadow palette and Iu2019m obsessed. The colors are very pigmented and perfect for fall and my everyday look. Most importantly it goes on smoothly and allows for buildable coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow palette is SO good!!!!!! Itu2019s so pigmented and the sparkly colors are so gorgeous! This palette is perfect for the holidays ud83dudc97ud83dudc97

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s fine, definitely not what I was expecting.  Very dusty and the glitter is flaky.  I expected better from ABH and returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEAUTIFUL!!! Colors blend effortlessly. This for sure will be used every day. Buy it you won't regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmers in this palette are amazing. But the mattes are not good. Theyu2019re so powdery and go everywhere. I have better neutral palettes so will be returning but the shimmers are 5/5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is amazing! The light shades work so well for my skin tone (very light neutral) and the shimmers are stunning! I like how wearable for everyday this is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re looking for an ethereal eyes dupe this may be it. The shimmers are very similar to it! Iu2019d love to have this palette in my collection. I happened to walk past it at my local Sephora and ended up swatching it and really liking the shimmers. Since I already own ethereal eyes I did not buy it (yet).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was my first palette from Anastasia and I would like to say it is just awesome - colour story, pigmentation, sparkles for such a good price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased this palette, and I absolutely love it! I've always enjoyed the ABH formula, and the color story is definitely what I go for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These computer generated photos donu2019t do it justice!!! This palette is so absolutely gorgeous in real life and there are multiple shimmer/ sparkle formulas and easy to work with mattes in this. Slim, light packaging great for travel and so many holiday looks I'm so so obsessed with this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had no idea these mini palettes where even dropping. I visited my local Sephora with one thing on my mind the CT exaggereyes palette. I ended up down the ABH aisle and seen this baby which to me look to be a similar color story. Itu2019s half the price and I am absolutely loving the pay off. ABH does not disappoint.
